news.title: Overwatch 2 Spotlight: A New Era of Innovation and Excitement
news.summary: 2025 is kicking off with the next evolution in Overwatch PvP gameplay.

news.title: Get ready for the DirectX 12 beta on Overwatch 2!
news.summary: We’re bringing a new opportunity to beta test DirectX 12 for high end performance and technical quality for Overwatch 2.

news.title: Defense Matrix – Keeping Overwatch 2 Fair and Fun for Every Player
news.summary: Our latest update in stopping disruptive play in Overwatch 2 provides updates to stopping cheats, keeping things fair for new players, and keeping the community friendly for everyone.

news.title: Groundbreaking PvP Gameplay Changes Coming... Learn More on February 12!
news.summary: Heroes, get ready! Overwatch 2 Spotlight is coming February 12. Join us for a first look at our most groundbreaking PVP gameplay changes, coming this February and beyond.

news.title: Season 14 Midseason: Classic Fun, Deadly Elegance, and Lunar Mischief
news.summary: Midseason delivers chaos, elegance, and celebration—relive an iconic meta, claim final rewards, and gear up for the next chapter!

news.title: Director’s Take: Happy Holidays
news.summary: Aaron sits down to look back at Hazard’s Launch and look forward to the New Year.

news.title: Winter Wonderland Brings More Holiday Cheer!
news.summary: Winter Wonderland returns to Overwatch 2 with festive games, 6v6 experiments, and rewards including new Legendary skins.

news.title: Overwatch 2 x Avatar: The Last Airbender Collab
news.summary: Master the elements and bring balance to the battlefield with the Overwatch 2 x Avatar: The Last Airbender event!
